curriculumname: Diploma programme <sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>Wirtschaftswissenschaften 2009W
title: Seminar Applied B2B-Marketing
ziele:
Students will focus intently on the details of B2B Marketing. Didactic methods of learning include group work and presentations by students.

By working on projects for cooperation partners and analyzing selected case studies in depth, student will learn more about selected and current issues in B2B Marketing.

Students will understand conditions under which marketing decisions are made at companies and will be in a position to methodically and conceptually develop sound methods of resolution.
lehrinhalte: The course focuses on implementation relevant aspects of B2B Marketing. Students will complete projects for cooperation partners or analyze and discuss case studies.
methoden: Group work; presentations; completing a term paper
